text: Mario Alberto Salazar Madera (born 14 August 1975) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Jalisco. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Mario Alberto Salazar Madera
